snippet: A shootout, in Meghalaya State near Bangladesh, was the second in a week linked to an armed group known as the Garo National Liberation Army.
abstract: Militants kill five Indian police officers in the forest near the border with Bangladesh, second deadly episode in a week linked to the Garo National Liberation Army.
lead_paragraph: A shootout, in Meghalaya State near Bangladesh, was the second in a week linked to an armed group known as the Garo National Liberation Army.

headline.main: Militants Kill 5 Police Officers in India
headline.print_headline: India: 5 Officers Killed in Shootout With Separatists
